words.text:
２００カ゛メルて゛買い取ったのか？
その分は返そう。{6}{f}
words.translation:
You paid 200 gamel?
Here you go. {6}{f}

words.text: 開けてみろ。{6}{f}
words.translation: Open it. {6}{f}

words.text:
またナイトシェート゛に会ったなら、
くれく゛れも気をつけるこった。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Be careful if you encounter
Nightshade again.{6}{f}

words.text: し゛ゃあ、帰りな。{6}{f}
words.translation: See ya.{6}{f}

Wanna know somethin',
it's 100 gamel. {f}

words.text: 今日は何の用た゛？{6}{f}
words.translation: What now?{6}{f}

words.text:
悪いか゛、１００カ゛メルを
払ってもらおうか。{f}
words.translation: I'll take 100 gamel. {f}

words.text: なら、自分て゛探すこった。{6}{f}
words.translation: Find out yerself then. {6}{f}

words.text:
胞子て゛すね。
しは゛らくお待ちくた゛さい。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The spores.
Just a minute. {6}{f}

words.text:
導師さまか゛お呼ひ゛て゛す。
奥へと゛うそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The master is calling. 
You may enter. {6}{f}

words.text: この部屋へと゛うそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation: This is the room.{6}{f}

words.text: 何かこ゛用て゛しょうか？{6}{f}
words.translation: How can I help?{6}{f}

words.text:
{c}{0}さんて゛すね。
すこし、お待ちくた゛さい。{6}{f}
words.translation:
{c}{0}, yes?
Please wait. {6}{f}

words.text:
よく来てくた゛さいました。
マナ・ライ様か゛お待ちて゛す。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Thanks for coming. 
Mana Rai is waiting.{6}{f}

words.text:
導師さまか゛お待ちて゛す。
奥へと゛うそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The master is waiting. 
This way.{6}{f}

words.text: 勝手に入られてはこまります。{6}{f}
words.translation: Please don't.{6}{f}

words.text:
ち、ちょっと、
奥へ来ていたた゛けますか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Ah, could you please 
come to the back? {6}{f}

words.text:
{c}{0}様て゛すね、
奥へと゛うそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
{c}{0}, yes?
This way.{6}{f}

words.text:
ファリスの正義か゛
あなた方を守りますように。{6}{f}
words.translation:
May you go with
Pharis' justice. {6}{f}

words.text:
その方なら左の部屋に
おられますよ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
He's resting in the
left room.{6}{f}

words.text:
ふうむ...
ちょっと待っておれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Hmm... 
Hold on. {6}{f}

words.text:
調査か゛終ったら、報告してくれ。
報酬は払うから心配するな。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Come back when you're done.
I'll pay your reward then. {6}{f}

words.text:
もう必要ないた゛ろう。
仮面は返してくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
I'll take the mask.
You don't need it. {6}{f}

words.text:
これから会議か゛あるから
ひきとってくれんか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Sorry, we're about to have 
a meeting.{6}{f}

words.text:
カ゛ラか？
まあ、奥に入りな。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Gara?
Come on back.{6}{f}

words.text:
カ゛ラ、
この冒険者は何た゛？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Gara, who are these
people? {6}{f}

words.text: ツーレと゛のか゛ねぇ...{6}{f}
words.translation: Sir Toure... {6}{f}

words.text:
何かありそうな気か゛したのて゛、
掘っていたのた゛か゛、まさか洞窟とは。{6}{f}
words.translation:
I knew something was there while 
digging, but a whole cave?{6}{f}

words.text:
地底湖か゛あったのか。
行ってみれは゛よかったかな？{6}{f}
words.translation:
So there's an underground
lake. Could I go see?{6}{f}

words.text:
あなたか゛たは、
村の恩人た゛。ありか゛とう。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The village owes you.
Thank you. {6}{f}

words.text:
今度は
まともな井戸を掘ってやる。{6}{f}
words.translation:
I'll dig it proper 
next time.{6}{f}

words.text: よそ者は、さっさと立ちさってくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation: Outsiders should leave.{6}{f}

words.text:
カ゛ラート゛し゛ゃないか。
よく来てくれた。村長に会ってくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Hey, Garard.
You should see the chief.{6}{f}

words.text:
ハ゛ラムし゛ゃないか。
よく来てくれた。村長に会ってくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Hey, Baram. 
You should see the chief.{6}{f}

It's frustrating, but goblins
have taken over the mines.{6}{f}

words.text:
つかれているなら
休んて゛ゆくか゛いい。{6}{f}
words.translation:
If you're tired, you 
should rest.{6}{f}

words.text:
もちろんた゛とも。
待っておるよ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Of course. 
I'm waiting. {6}{f}

words.text:
そうて゛すか。
それはさ゛んねん。{6}{f}
words.translation:
I see. 
Ah, well.{6}{f}

words.text:
また、このあたりに来られる
ことか゛あれは゛、立ちよってくた゛さい。{6}{f}
words.translation:
If you happen to come
this way again, stop on by. {6}{f}

words.text: と゛うか、村をすくってくた゛さい。{6}{f}
words.translation: Please, save the village.{6}{f}

words.text:
鉱山への入口は村の奥にあります。
お気をつけて。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The mine entrance is at the
back of the village.{6}{f}

words.text:
魔物を倒してくた゛さったのて゛すか？
はやく父に知らせてくた゛さい。{6}{f}
words.translation:
You've defeated the monsters?
Please let Father know. {6}{f}

words.text:
本当にありか゛とう。
感謝しています。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Thank you. We are 
in your debt. {6}{f}

words.text:
ト゛ワーフのセ゛ム？
おれたち人間か゛気にすることし゛ゃない。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Dwarven zem? 
I don't deal with non-Humans.{6}{f}

words.text: おぉぉぉ、くっ苦しい。{6}{f}
words.translation: OoOoo, it hurts! {6}{f}

words.text: なんた゛、きさまらは。{6}{f}
words.translation: The hell are you?{6}{f}

words.text:
ち、きさまら  と゛このまわし者た゛！
みんな、こいつらをつかまえろ！{6}{f}
words.translation:
T-They're intruders! 
Everyone, get them!{6}{f}

words.text:
ま、待ってくれ。
おれは金て゛やとわれたた゛けなんた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
W-Wait!
I'm just a mercenary!{6}{f}
H-help...{6}{f}

words.text: 誰た゛、そこにいるのは！{6}{f}
words.translation: Who's there!?{6}{f}

words.text:
おまえたちか、我々の計画を
し゛ゃましてくれたのは。{6}{f}
words.translation:
So you're the ones ruining 
our plans.{6}{f}

words.text:
おのれ...  このようなやからに
し゛ゃまされるとは！  おほ゛えておれ！{6}{f}
words.translation:
Curses! My plans!! 
I'll remember this!{6}{f}

words.text: 行け！  あいつらを殺すのた゛！{6}{f}
words.translation: Go! Kill them! {6}{f}

words.text: さわか゛しいそ゛、なにこ゛とた゛？{6}{f}
words.translation: What's going on out here?{6}{f}

words.text:
これこそか゛、ミルリーフのたましい。
これか゛あれは゛神の復活はまち゛かた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The soul of Mirleaf! 
Their resurrection is nigh!{6}{f}

words.text: うむ、わかった。{6}{f}
words.translation: Ah, I see. {6}{f}

words.text:
おのれ！
また、きさまらか！{6}{f}
words.translation:
Ach! 
You again! {6}{f}

words.text: おお、島

そうか。しかたないな。
他の奴をさか゛すよ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
I'll find someone else,
then. {6}{f}

Hey, wait, we haven't found
the treasure I want yet.{6}{f}

words.text:
えっと、ここからた゛と
た゛いたい北東のほうた゛な。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Hmm, I think it's mostly
northeast from here.{6}{f}

words.text:
この北に、遭跡への入口か゛
あるはす゛た゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The entrance to the ruins
is north of here. {6}{f}

words.text:
こわされている...くそっ！
誰か、先に来た奴か゛いるな！{6}{f}
words.translation:
It's broken... Damn!
Someone has been here! {6}{f}

words.text:
待った。たふ゛んこいつて゛
開くはす゛なんた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Wait. This will probably 
open it.{6}{f}

words.text: エレメンタルの法則？{6}{f}
words.translation: Elemental law? {6}{f}

words.text: うるせえな。あっちへ行きな。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Shut up. 
Go away. {6}{f}

words.text:
...誰か助けてくれぇ！
うわぁぁ！！{6}{f}
words.translation:
Someone help!
Uwaaah!{6}{f}

words.text: う...助かったのか？{6}{f}
words.translation: ...I'm saved? {6}{f}

words.text:
けっこう強いんた゛な。
見なおしたせ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
You're strong. 
I'm impressed. {6}{f}

words.text:
「神像の矢」を持って行くなら、
奇跡の店のおやし゛によろしくな。{6}{f}
words.translation:
If you're taking the Idol 
Arrow, say hi to the old man.{6}{f}

words.text: おれはタット゛。よろしく。{6}{f}
words.translation: Hey, I'm Tad. {6}{f}

words.text:
さすか゛に、このあたりは
ふ゛きみな感し゛か゛するな。{6}{f}
words.translation:
There is definitely an 
evil aura around here.{6}{f}

words.text:
あんたたちか゛行かないと、
こっちも思いきり戦えないんた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
If you don't go, I can't
fight with my all.{6}{f}

words.text:
動くな。
おまえたち、何者た゛？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Don't move.
Who are you? {6}{f}

I will find Lateria.
Gara and Ein will search
for the spirit stone of 
water.{6}{f}

Dalaia should not target you 
further. Head back to town. {6}{f}

words.text: いや...タ゛ライアは私のいとこた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation: ...Dalaia is my cousin. {6}{f}

words.text:
て゛は、この奥にあるはす゛の
「精霊石」をさか゛しに行こう。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Let's find that spirit stone 
inside. {6}{f}

words.text: カ゛ラ、ラテリアをたのんた゛そ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation: Gara, help Lateria. {6}{f}

words.text:
カ゛ラて゛はないか。
しっかりしろ！{6}{f}
words.translation:
Gara!
Wake up! {6}{f}
Curse you! {6}{f}
Curse Dalaia.{6}{f}

words.text:
これは...
このししゅうはラテリアのものた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
This hairpin...
It's Lateria's. {6}{f}

words.text: ラテリア、無事た゛ったのか？{6}{f}
words.translation: Lateria, are you okay? {6}{f}

words.text:
ありか゛とう、妹よ。
あとは私の役目た゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Thank you, sister. 
My turn. {6}{f}

words.text:
タ゛ライア。わか゛父を殺すとは、
何を血迷ったのた゛？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Dalaia, what madness is
all of this?{6}{f}

words.text: なにを...たわこ゛とを。{6}{f}
words.translation: You speak drivel.{6}{f}

words.text:
...タ゛ライア...すへ゛ては、
私の迷いのせいた゛ったのか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
...Was all this because of
my own hesitation?{6}{f}

words.text: いそいて゛行くといい。{6}{f}
words.translation: Go. Hurry. {6}{f}

words.text:
今はあらそう時て゛はない。
邪神を...滅ほ゛さなくてはならない。{6}{f}

{c}{0}、
力をかしてはくれないか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
{c}{0}, 
will you help us? {6}{f}

words.text:
君なら...
わかってくれると思ったのた゛か゛...{6}{f}
words.translation:
I thought you of all would 
understand... {6}{f}

words.text:
いや、その通りた゛。
私はもと゛ろう。{6}{f}
words.translation:
No, exactly. 
I'm leaving. {6}{f}

words.text:
友よ。
目的のはたされることを...{6}{f}
words.translation:
Friend.
Our goal...{6}{f}

words.text: やはり、追っ手か！{6}{f}
words.translation: They're coming!{6}{f}

words.text: その前に、こいつらをと゛うにかせねは゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
We have to do something about
them. {6}{f}

words.text:
ツーレと゛の、
この冒険者たちはと゛うします？{6}{f}
words.translation:
What should be we do with them,
Sir Toure? {6}{f}

words.text: 信用て゛きるのか？{6}{f}
words.translation: Can we trust them? {6}{f}

words.text:
この奥にあるはす゛なのた゛か゛、
ラテリア様の身も心配た゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Should be back here. 
I'm worried about Lateria, too.{6}{f}

words.text:
ラテリア様のことは
こ゛心配なく。{6}{f}
words.translation: Don't worry about Lateria. {6}{f}

words.text:
タ゛ライアは切れ者た゛。
危なくなってもかは゛ってはやれぬそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Dalaia is a sharp one. 
I can't protect you from him.{6}{f}

words.text:
ここに「ロハ゛の耳」という酒場か゛ある。
そこの主人は、私の仲間た゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
A bar called Loba's Ear is
around here. I know the owner.{6}{f}

words.text: ツーレと゛のか゛助っ人に選んた゛のた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation: Sir Toure chose me to help.{6}{f}

words.text: それよりも、情報か゛ほしい。{6}{f}
words.translation: I want information more. {6}{f}

words.text:
砂漠の村へ連れさられる前に
お助けせねは゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
We have to save her before 
she's brought back. {6}{f}

words.text: はやくラテリア様を！{6}{f}
words.translation: Save Lateria! {6}{f}

words.text:
ハ゛カめか゛、ひっかかったな！
魔獣のエサとなるか゛いい！{6}{f}
words.translation:
Idiots, I've caught you! 
Eat them, my pet!{6}{f}

words.text: なかよく、くたは゛るか゛いい！{6}{f}
words.translation: Die already! {6}{f}

words.text: 死にそ゛こないと゛もめか゛！{6}{f}
words.translation: Why won't you die!?{6}{f}

words.text:
おまえたち、いつの間に！
タ゛ライア様！{6}{f}
words.translation:
When did you get in here!? 
Dalaia!{6}{f}

words.text: お願い、助けて。{6}{f}
words.translation: Please, help.{6}{f}

words.text:
故郷から来た男？
彼の名は？{6}{f}
words.translation:
A man from home? 
Who? {6}{f}

words.text:
タ゛ライアは、
奥の部屋にいます。{6}{f}
words.translation: Dalaia is back there.{6}{f}

words.text: 兄さま！{6}{f}
words.translation: Toure! {6}{f}

words.text:
本当にありか゛とう。
お元気て゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Thank you. 
Take care. {6}{f}

words.text:
待ってくれ、彼らは私と同し゛冒険者た゛。
話を聞いてやってはと゛うた゛ろう？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Wait, they're adventurers, too.
Let's hear them out. {6}{f}

words.text: ツーレ、急こ゛う。{6}{f}
words.translation: Hurry, Toure. {6}{f}

words.text: 君の妹はと゛うするんた゛？{6}{f}
words.translation: And your sister? {6}{f}

words.text:
この事件はかなり危険た゛。
今のうちに帰りなさい。{6}{f}
words.translation:
This is getting dangerous. 
Go home. {6}{f}

words.text:
ツーレ、彼らも手伝ってくれると
言っている。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Toure, they're saying they 
will help.{6}{f}

words.text:
ツーレはいい奴た゛。
しっかり手伝ってくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Toure is a good man. 
Help him out.{6}{f}

words.text:
ん...うっ...
あっ、君たちは！{6}{f}
words.translation:
Agh... 
Hey, you!6}{f}

words.text:
私もあとからついてゆくから、
先に行ってくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
I'll follow later. 
You go ahead.{6}{f}

words.text: やったか！{6}{f}
words.translation: Great! {6}{f}

words.text:
{c}{0}たちし゛ゃないか。
助かった。ここから出してくれ。{6}{f}
words.translation:
{c}{0}, it's you. 
Get me out of here.{6}{f}

words.text: 助かったよ。ありか゛とう。{6}{f}
words.translation: Thanks. Really.{6}{f}

words.text: 心強い。よろしくたのむそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation: Thank you, friends.{6}{f}

They haven't found it yet. 
Let's head to the temple.{6}{f}

words.text: すまなかった。{6}{f}
words.translation: Sorry. {6}{f}

words.text: セリア、心配をかけて悪かった。{6}{f}
words.translation: Sorry for worrying you, Celia. {6}{f}

words.text: ナオリ...すまん。{6}{f}
words.translation: Sorry, Nao. {6}{f}

words.text: 「竜の神像」た゛な。{6}{f}
words.translation: The dragon idol, yes?{6}{f}

words.text:
「神狩りの竜」とは、
神々の大戦争にもて゛てくる、
強大な力を持った竜のことた゛。{6}
太古、竜は神すら殺すほと゛の
力を持っていた。{6}
現在、世界にはひ゛こる
トカケ゛の親玉

私はアインの娘のセリアて゛す。
父に何かこ゛用て゛すか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
I am Celia, Ein's daughter.
You need my father?{6}{f}

words.text:
何か、よくない事て゛も
起こったのて゛すか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Did something bad
happen? {6}{f}

words.text:
みなさんも無理をなさらないて゛
くた゛さいね。{6}{f}
words.translation: Please be careful. {6}{f}

words.text: お父さん？！{6}{f}
words.translation: Father!? {6}{f}

words.text: みなさん、ありか゛とう。{6}{f}
words.translation: Thank you all. {6}{f}

words.text:
アイン様の行き先て゛すか？
さあ？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Where did he go? 
Not sure.{6}{f}

words.text:
冒険者の店から来られたのて゛すね。
奥へと゛うそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
You came from the inn? 
Enter. {6}{f}

It's good you're safe. 
Everyone was so worried! {6}{f}

words.text:
井戸の底か゛、
洞窟につなか゛るなんて。{6}{f}
words.translation:
So a cave was at the 
bottom of the well... {6}{f}

words.text:
と゛うも
こ゛くろうさまて゛した。{6}{f}
words.translation: Well done. {6}{f}

words.text:
えっ、郊外のやしきへいく？！
やめた方か゛いいせ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
The house on the outskirts!? 
Better not.{6}{f}

words.text:
郊外のやしきには、
魔法の品か゛山ほと゛あるそうた゛。{6}{f}
words.translation:
There are a lot of magical 
items at that house.{6}{f}

words.text: 海に落ちるなよ、助けてやらんそ゛。{6}{f}
words.translation: Don't go overboard.{6}{f}

words.text:
{c}{0}し゛ゃないか。
無事た゛ったんた゛な。{6}{f}
words.translation:
Hey, {c}{0}. 
You're okay! {6}{f}

words.text: おれの船はと゛こた゛？{6}{f}
words.translation: Where's my ship? {6}{f}

words.text:
ミルリーフ？！
あの死者をあやつる邪神？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Mirleaf!?
The god of death?{6}{f}

words.text:
おれの船をそんな目に
あわせてなるか！
すく゛にこの島

て゛は、このままイケニエにされるのを
待てと言うのか？{6}{f}
words.translation:
Then you plan on waiting here
to die? {6}{f}

words.text:
